lines.text: So you are going to fix everything up by getting good and tight!

[looking at a flaming dish in the kitchen]
Ain't that purdy. I never get tired lookin' at them blue flames.
You best not get tired lookin' at them, sister. You gonna be seeing a lot more of them when you passes on!

[speaking of his drunken son to Judge Brandon and Major Randolph after dinner]
Republican tendencies, George, that's what's the matter.
I never knew a Republican who could hold more than a pint.
